Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heh heh...Hey, man. I heard about what
happened.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Another girl from out of town came all the way
here to confess to you again, huh? Aren't you
the lady-killer!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Not really. ...Wait, how did you know that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Heh heh! Don't underestimate how
comprehensive my information network can be!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But man, now I'm jealous! All those pretty girls
hangin' off you... You're the bane of unpopular
guys everywhere!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa! You don't have to put it that way, y'know!
And what're you "jealous" about? You've got a
girlfriend already!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, right! I do!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gone are the days when I'd cry into my hankie
when you'd go on and on about how tiring it
was to have girls just throw themselves at you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now YOU have to sit there and listen to ME talk
about how awesomely romantic me and my
girlfriend are!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>When did I ever brag to you about my
popularity? You'd just hear these things and then
come whine to me about them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I've heard so much of your gushing about your
love life that I wanna take that hankie you cried
into and gag you with it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Oh, c'mon! Don't be such a stick-in-the-mud,
man! Just listening won't hurt you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I mean, isn't <MYNAME> just the most adorable
girlfriend ever? You won't believe what she did
the other day...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dwah?! <MYNAME>! D-did you hear all of
that...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Nice timing.
<PAGE>
You know, it'd be great if you could tell your
boyfriend here to talk about something besides
his romantic misadventures.
Look away.
Chide Fritz.
Gush along with Fritz.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey now! Are you seriously giving up before
you've even started? You're the only one he'll
listen to.
<PAGE>
I'm the one who has to put up with his endless
gushing day in and day out. Put yourself in my
shoes for a minute!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah...I guess I do get carried away sometimes.
Sorry 'bout that, Raeger.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll try to hold back more in the future. Er...well,
I'll try to think about holding back. A little.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hrmmm...this could be kinda hard...but I can do
it. Yeah...I can do this. I think. Maybe. Ummm...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Don't strain yourself too hard there, champ. ...I
guess I don't mind lending an ear every now and
then. Just, y'know...not every day.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know how much you realize it, but you're
really loved, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Give Fritz half an inch and he'll go on and on
about you till the cows come home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though with someone like you as his
sweetheart, I can understand why he'd want to
brag.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sure you had some...ah...other offers. You
sure you're okay with him?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well?
Of course!
I dunno...
I'm kinda rethinking it...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>! I love you too! You're so awesome!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I get it, I get it! You two are crazily in love with
each other and you won't stop until the whole
world knows it!
<PAGE>
I've heard aaaaall about it -- more than my share,
really. Why don't you go somewhere else and
gush about each other already?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Wait...WHAT?! <MYNAME>, you can't...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...I get it. You were just joking! Geez, you
gave me a real shock there.
<PAGE>
For a second, I was honestly worried you
might've stopped loving me. Don't scare me like
that!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's great, but if you don't stop it with the
gushy love stories, you might end up driving her
off, y'know.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-hey! Don't say stuff like that! I did promise I'd
try to stop doing it so much!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeaaaah, you'll forgive me for thinking you didn't
sound like you could pull it off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Urk!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>You'd better try really hard now, or today's joke
could become tomorrow's truth!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Waaaah! Don't say such mean things, you...you
stupid foodie! Cad! Womanizer!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I guess I might've teased him a bit much. I'll
have to apologize later.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh?! <MYNAME>, y-you're kidding, right?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Nooooooooo, <MYNAME>! I don't wanna break
up! Take me baaack!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bwuh? It was a joke. Wheeeeew! Thank
goodness.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Don't make jokes like that, would you? Even
thinking you'd break things off with me probably
took five years off my life!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>...! I never knew you loved me that
much...!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I love you too, <MYNAME>! I love you so so so
so so SOOOOOOO MUCH!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Geez. Most TREES don't have that much sap,
you two.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I get it, I get it! You two are crazily in love with
each other and you won't stop until the whole
world knows it!
<PAGE>
I've heard aaaaall about it -- more than my share,
really. Why don't you go somewhere else and
gush about each other already?
